channel.description: Personal blog and projects by Ronnie Lutalo

item.title: How To Debug Code Like A Pro
item.description: In most cases, you’ll identify a bug or an error that requires your immediate attention. Take for example you just noticed an ugly bug in production that deletes user data. In such a scenario, you don’t have much time and need to fix it like ‘right now’! You neither have a couple of days nor a week to troubleshoot this, you literally have now!
item.content:encoded: In most cases, you’ll identify a bug or an error that requires your immediate attention. Take for example you just noticed an ugly bug in production that deletes user data. In such a scenario, you don’t have much time and need to fix it like ‘right now’! You neither have a couple of days nor a week to troubleshoot this, you literally have now!
